snippet: Imran Khan gave a three-day ultimatum to the national election commission on Wednesday to look into his political party’s claims of vote-rigging in last week’s election.
abstract: Imran Khan, former cricket star turned politician, gives three-day ultimatum to Pakistan's national election commission to look into his political party’s claims of vote-rigging in the general election.
lead_paragraph: Imran Khan gave a three-day ultimatum to the national election commission on Wednesday to look into his political party’s claims of vote-rigging in last week’s election.

headline.seo: Pakistan: Imran Khan Seeks Vote Inquiry
headline.main: Pakistan: Imran Khan Seeks Vote Inquiry
